data.name: Strange Dungeon
data.detailed_description:
Overview

Find allies, friends, or lovers as your crew explores, researches, and negotiates their way through this turn-based tactical roguelike about convincing cave monsters not to kill you. Make smart decisions to avoid vicious perils like nuclear meltdowns, panic attacks, and badly seasoned fish.

Features


  • Figure out how to communicate with cave monsters in turn-based tactical encounters.
  • Explore and study unique environments staffed by bizarre creatures and exotic objects.
  • Make difficult decisions to balance anxiety, research, health, and fuel as your adventure continues.
  • Every playthrough is unique and high stakes because the levels are procedurally generated and death is permanent.
  • Machine Learning powered AI ensures that the monsters are weird and express themselves in unexpected ways.

data.short_description: Find allies, friends, or lovers as your crew explores, researches, and negotiates their way through this turn-based tactical roguelike about convincing cave monsters to not kill you. Make smart decisions to avoid vicious perils like nuclear meltdowns, panic attacks, and badly seasoned fish.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Athlon X4 | Intel Core i5 4460
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 950 | AMD R7 370
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

release_date.date: It's complicated. If you wishlist that would help!
